verbose_text: Reports suggest that a reduction of 0.5 units in pH tends to increase the ROS accumulation by many folds in Hordium vulgare L. [XREF_BIBR] and Pinus sylvestris L. [XREF_BIBR], whereas the increase in pH also generates oxidative stress in Malus spp rootstocks [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: pH tends to increase the ROS
